attributes.action: Call upon Channel 4 and Chatsworth TV to make new series of the crystal maze with Richard O'Brien based on the original series from the early 90's.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Well flicking through the TV channels of today results in nothing bar reality TV shows, dancing in ice etc.  It’s boring, soulless and doesn’t quite hit the mark.  So let’s get some good quality shows that got the blood pumping and were a laugh a min.  

We also need to ask Richard O'Brien back as he made the show - so sign and let’s get on with it.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
